title: MCredd - package creation steps
text: Create Github repository. Create R project Github (See https://happygitwithr.com/ linking Github repos Rstudio). usethis::create_package("PATH/MCredd") PATH path project folder set project creation. usethis::use_pkgdown() usethis::use_vignette("app-generation", title = "MCredd - package creation steps")

title: MCredd - package creation steps
text: Add dependencies DESCRIPTION: Analysis Shiny related Geospatial
code: usethis::use_package("magrittr") usethis::use_package("readr") usethis::use_package("tidyselect") usethis::use_package("dplyr") usethis::use_package("ggplot2") #usethis::use_package("tibble") #usethis::use_package("forcats") usethis::use_package("purrr") usethis::use_package("stringr") usethis::use_package("rlang") # usethis::use_package("tidyverse", type = "depends") usethis::use_package("readxl") usethis::use_package("shiny") usethis::use_package("shinyjs") usethis::use_package("shinyWidgets") usethis::use_package("bslib") usethis::use_package("sf") usethis::use_package("terra") usethis::use_package("units")

title: Authors and Citation

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: MonteCarlo simulations estimating uncertainty REDD+ greenhouse gas emissions removals forest changes.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Input Monte Carlo model input variables characteristics (raw data aggregation factors, see v2.0 roadmap) Chose number repetitions Choose add custom formulas input variables. Run Simulations app simulate desired number repetitions calculate uncertainty calculated variables.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: input_category / input_name / input_error_type / input_distribution / fixed_value / normal_mu / normal_sigma / others

what: Run Monte Carlo for REDD+ uncertainty's shiny app — shiny_run_MCredd
title: Run Monte Carlo for REDD+ uncertainty's shiny app — shiny_run_MCredd
text: Starts R Shiny application guide users fill context land use changes forest related greenhouse gas emissions removals. Inputs include distribution parameters various distribution app returns error propagation sensitivity analysis overall uncertainty GHG estimates.
